item.title: The anatomy of Fore
item.description: Before stepping deeper a basic understanding of the main parts of Fore is necessary. Fore uses a classical Model-View-Controller (MVC) architecture. There are 3 basic things to remember: The model (<fx-model>) holds the data and refreshes the User Interface (UI) according to the state of the model. When the user interacts with a page the UI will trigger Actions to change the data in the model.
